name: promptbox
title: PromptBox
description: Store and quickly access your LLM prompts with format support and VSCode integration
author: rasmus_widing

commands.name: configure-folder
commands.title: Configure Prompts Folder
commands.subtitle: Set up where your prompts will be stored
commands.description: Choose or create a folder to store your prompts

commands.name: promptbox
commands.title: Browse Prompts
commands.subtitle: Browse and use your stored prompts
commands.description: Browse through your prompts with tag filtering and quick actions

preferences.name: promptsFolder
preferences.title: Prompts Folder
preferences.description: The folder where your prompts are stored (supports ~ for home directory)

preferences.name: vscodePath
preferences.title: VSCode Path
preferences.description: Path to VSCode executable (leave empty to use default system editor)

commands.name: create-prompt
commands.title: Create Prompt
commands.subtitle: Create a new prompt in your preferred format
commands.description: Create a new prompt and save it in txt, md, json, or xml format

commands.name: edit-prompts
commands.title: Edit Prompts
commands.subtitle: Open prompts in your editor
commands.description: Browse and open prompts in VSCode or your default editor

commands.name: open-folder
commands.title: Open Prompts Folder
commands.subtitle: Open the entire prompts folder in your editor
commands.description: Open the prompts folder in VSCode or your default editor

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
